<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Bastion Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1895) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 159 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Bastion](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=49)

**Prerequisites**
[Shield Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=839)

</column>

---

You are particularly skilled at using a shield in combat. You gain the [Reactive Shield](/Feats.aspx?ID=360) fighter feat. This fulfills any prerequisite requiring Reactive Shield as normal.

**Special** You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the bastion archetype.

<title level="2">Bastion Dedication leads to...</title>
[Destructive Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=1898), [Disarming Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=1896), [Drive Back](/Feats.aspx?ID=3617), [Nimble Shield Hand](/Feats.aspx?ID=1897), [Shield Salvation](/Feats.aspx?ID=1899)
name: Bastion Dedication
